Submodules¶

eys3d.cameraProperty module¶

class eys3d.cameraProperty.CameraProperty(camera_device)

Bases: object

This class contains the camera properties.

This class contains the camera properties including auto exposure, auto white balance, low light compesation, light source switch, and etc. User could controls the propeties by following function. [EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Parameters

camera_device (obj) – CameraDevice.

disable_AE()

Disable auto exposure mode.

To disable auto exposure mode.

disable_AWB()

Disable auto white balance mode.

To disable auto white balance mode.

disable_low_light_compensation()

Disable low light compesation mode.

To disable low light compesation mode.

enable_AE()

Enable auto exposure mode.

To enable auto exposure mode.

enable_AWB()

Enable auto white balance mode.

To enable auto white balance mode.

enable_low_light_compensation()

Enable low light compesation mode.

To enable low light compesation mode.

get_AE_status()

Get the status of auto exposure.

To get the status of auto exposure.

Returns

The return value. True for enable, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_AWB_status()

Get the status of auto white balance.

To get the status of auto white balance.

Returns

The return value. True for enable, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_exposure_range()

Get the exposure range from eYs3D camera module.

To get the exposure range as a dictionary. The key is following: * Max * Min * Step * Default * Flag

Returns

The exposure range. The key is following:

  • Max

  • Min

  • Step

  • Default

  • Flag

Return type

dict

get_exposure_value()

Get the exposure value.

To get the exposure value. The value is calculated by log2. The range of value is -13 ~ 3.

Returns

The exposure value. The range is -13 ~ 3.

Return type

int

get_light_source_status()

Get the status of light source.

To get the status of light source. The options are 50 Hz and 60 Hz.

Returns

VALUE_50HZ is 50 Hz, VALUE_60HZ is 60 Hz.

Return type

LIGHT_SOURCE_VALUE

get_low_light_compensation_status()

Get the status of low light compensation.

To get the status of low light compensation.

Returns

The return value. True for enable, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_manual_exposure_time()

Get the manual exposure time.

To get the manual exposure time. [EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Returns

The exposure time. [EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Return type

float

get_white_balance_temperature()

Get the white balance temperature.

To get the white balance temperature.

Returns

The white balance temperature (the range is 2800 ~ 6500).

Return type

int

get_white_balance_temperature_range()

Get the range of white balance temperature.

To Get the range of white balance temperature as a dictionary. The key is following : * Max * Min * Step * Default * Flag

Returns

The range of white balance temperature. The key is following:

  • Max

  • Min

  • Step

  • Default

  • Flag

Return type

dict

set_exposure_value(value)

Set the exposure value.

To set the exposure value. The range of value is -13 ~ 3. It would set to minimun or maximun value if input-value is out of range.

Parameters

value (int) – The exposure value. The range is -13 ~ 3.

set_light_source(value)

Set the light source.

To set the light source The options are 50 Hz and 60 Hz.

value (LIGHT_SOURCE_VALUE): Set to VALUE_50HZ for 50 Hz and VALUE_60HZ for 60 Hz

set_manual_exposure_time(value)

Set the manual exposure time.

To set the manual exposure time. [EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Parameters

value (float) – The manual exposure time.

set_white_balance_temperature(value)

Set the white balance temperature.

To set the white balance temperatue. The range is 2800 ~ 6500.

Parameters

value – The white balance temperature.The range si 2800 ~ 6500.

eys3d.config module¶

class eys3d.config.Config

Bases: object

This class is to set the configuration of streaming.

This class is to set the configuration of streaming. It could set the resolution and format of color and depth frame.

get_color_stream_resolution()

Get the resolution of color stream.

Get the resolution of color frame. The return order is height, width.

Returns

The tuple contains height and width.

Return type

tuple

get_config()

Get the dictionary of the user-provided config.

To get the dictionary of the user-provided config.

Returns

The user-provided config. The key is following:

  • colorFormat: The format of color stream.

  • colorWidth: The width of color stream.

  • colorHeight: The height of color stream.

  • depthWidth: The width of depth stream.

  • depthHeight: The width of depth stream.

  • actualFps: The actual fps.

  • depthFormat: The depth data type.

Return type

dict

get_depth_stream_resolution()

Get the resolution of depth stream.

Get the resolution of depth frame. The return order is height, width.

Returns

The tuple contains height and width.

Return type

tuple

set_color_stream(streamFormat, nEP0Width, nEP0Height, fps)

Set the format and resolution of color stream.

To set the format, resolution, and fps of color stream. Please refer PIF of camera module or ModeConfig.db.

Parameters

  • streamFormat (int) – The format of color stream. 0: YUY2. 1: MJPG. User could refer COLOR_RAW_DATA_YUY2 and COLOR_RAW_DATA_MJPG in COLOR_RAW_DATA_TYPE.

  • nEP0Width (int) – The width of the color stream.

  • nEP0Height (int) – The height of the color stream.

  • fps (int) – The fps of color stream.

set_depth_dataType(DepthDataType)

Set the data type of depth stream.

To set the data type for depth stream. Please refer DEPTH_RAW_DATA_TYPE. The options are: * DEPTH_RAW_DATA_8_BITS * DEPTH_RAW_DATA_11_BITS * DEPTH_RAW_DATA_14_BITS

set_depth_stream(streamFormat, nEP1Width, nEP1Height, fps)

Set the format and resolution of depth stream.

To set the format, resolution, and fps of depth stream. Please refer PIF of camera module or ModeConfig.db.

Parameters

  • streamFormat (int) – The format of depth stream. [TODO]

  • nEP0Width (int) – The width of the depth stream.

  • nEP0Height (int) – The height of the depth stream.

  • fps (int) – The fps of depth stream.

set_preset_mode_config(pid, index)

Set the preset mode config.

This function is to make the mode config setting easier. User could select mode index from modeConfig.db to complete config setting.

Parameters

  • pid (int) – The product id of camera module. Please refer the PIF. It is availabel for integer or heximal.

  • index (int) – The mode index in modeConfig.db.

class eys3d.config.ModeConfig(pid, index=None)

Bases: object

This class is to link database modeConfig.db.

This class is to link database modeConfig.db.

Parameters

  • pid (hex) – The product id of camera module. Please refer the PIF.

  • index (int) – The mode index in modeConfig.db.

get_current_index()

Get the index of current mode.

To get the index of current mode.

Returns

The index of current mode.

Return type

int

get_current_mode_info()

Get the information of current mode.

To get the information of current mode. It return a object of MODE_CONFIG.

Returns

The MODE_CONFIG. It contains

  • iMode

  • iUSB_Type

  • iInterLeaveModeFPS

  • eDecodeType_L

  • eDecodeType_K

  • eDecodeType_T

  • L_Resolution

  • D_Resolution

  • K_Resolution

  • T_Resolution

  • vecDepthType

  • vecColorFps

  • vecDepthFps

Return type

obj

get_mode_count()

Get the total number of mode in modeConfig.db.

To the the total number of mode on camera module in modeConfig.db.

get_modes()

Get the modes.

To Get the modes. It is not to be implemented.

Raises

NotImplementedError –

select_current_index(index)

Select the index that user wanted.

To select the index that user wanted. It raised error if index is not in modeConfig.db.

Parameters

index (int) – The index user wanted to select.

Raises

IndexError – If no index in modeConfig.db.

class eys3d.config.RectLogData(dictionary, nRectifyLogIndex)

Bases: object

This class is to save rectify log data.

This class is to save rectify log data. Its attribute is follow the eSPCtrl_RectLogData in eSPDI_def.h.

Parameters

  • dictionary – The dictonary of rectyLogData from eys3dPy.

  • nRectifyLogIndex – The index user wanted to select.

Raises

Exception – No rectify log.Please check rectify index.

get_dict()

Get the dictionary of rectify log data.

To get the dictionary of rectify log data. The key is refer to eSPCtrl_RectLogData in eSPDI_def.h.

Returns

The rectify log data as dictionary.

Return type

dict

save_json(fname=None)

Save rectify log data as json file.

To save rectify log data as json file. It save as RectfyLog-{index}.json if fname is not provided.

Parameters

fname (str) – The filename for json file. Default is RectfyLog-{index}.json if fname is None.

eys3d.device module¶

class eys3d.device.Device(camera_index=0)

Bases: object

The class is the function related to eys3d api function.

The class is to control the eys3d api function. First, it creates the EYS3D system to control the device. Second, user could decide the camera module by index provided by EYS3D system. The device could control following function: * Stream * DepthFilter * Property * Register * Depth information

Parameters

device_index (int) – Index for device would like to initialize.

close_stream()

Close stream

To close stream. The device would close the stream then erase the config and callback.

enable_stream()

Enable stream.

To enable stream. It would enable color, depth and point cloud streaming.

get_IRProperty()
get_cameraProperty()

Get the class of CameraProperty.

To get the class of CameraProperty. User could read description on cameraProperty.py in detail.

get_depthAccuracy()

Get the class of DepthAccuracy.

To get the class of DepthAccuracy. User could read description on depthAccuracy in detail.

get_depthFilter_options()

Get the class of DepthFilterOptions.

To get the class of DepthFilterOptions. User could read description on depthFilter in detail.

get_device_index()

Get the index of user-provided camera device.

To get the index of user-provided camera device.

Returns

The index of camera device.

Return type

int

get_device_info()

Get the device infomation.

To get the device information from camera module as dictionary. It contains FW version, VID , PID and etc…

Returns

The device information. The key is following:

  • firmware_version

  • serial_number

  • bus_info

  • mode_name

  • dev_info

    • PID

    • VID

    • dev_name

    • chip_ID

    • dev_type

Return type

dict

get_exposure_range()
get_rectify_mat_log_data(nRectifyLogIndex=None)
get_register_options()
get_usb_type()
get_z_range()
open_device(config, rectLogIndex=0, colorFrameCallback=None, depthFrameCallback=None, PCFrameCallback=None)

Open camera device with Config and callback function.

It would call APC_OpenDevice by stream setting. In the meantime, it also registers the callback function to get frame data.

Parameters

  • config (obj) – The Config class. It contains the streaming setting.

  • colorFrameCallback (function) – The callback function of color frame. User could define the callback function. If none, the device could not enable color streaming.

  • depthFrameCallback (function) – The callback function of depth frame. User could define the callback function. If none, the device could not enable depth streaming.

  • PCFrameCallback (function) – The callback function of point cloud frame. User could define the callback function. If none, the device could not enable point cloud streaming.

pause_stream()

Pause stream

To pause stream. The device would hold the resouce of config and callback function and then wait for next action.

release()

Release the device.

The EYS3D system would release the device.

set_z_range(near, far)

eys3d.pipeline module¶

class eys3d.pipeline.Pipeline(device_index=0)

Bases: object

This class is to manage the color, depth and point cloud stream with pipeline process.

This class is to manage the color, depth and point cloud stream with pipeline process. The purpose is for easier device operation. User could start pipeline with user-defined callback function.

Notice:

It will call get_color_frame and get_depth_frame if user start with user-defined callback function.

Parameters

device_index (int) – Index for device would like to initialize.

get_IRProperty()
get_accuracy_info()

Get the information of accruracy.

To get the information of accuracy as dictionary.

Returns

The dictionary contains the information of accuracy. The key is following:

  • distance

  • fill_rate

  • z_accuracy

  • temporal_noise

  • spatial_noise

  • angle

  • angle_x

  • angle_y

Return type

dict

get_cameraProperty()

Get the class of CameraProperty.

To get the class of CameraProperty. User could read description on cameraProperty.py in detail.

Returns

The class CameraProperty.

Return type

obj

get_color_frame(raw_data=False)

Get the color frame by default callback.

To get the color frame by default callback. It show rgb frame if raw_data is False, otherwise is raw data. The shape of rgb frame data is (H, W, 3). The shape of raw frame data is (H, W, 2).

Parameters

raw_data (bool) – True is raw data, YUY2 or MJPG. False is rgb data.

Returns

The array of frame data. The shape is (H, W, 3) if rgb data. The shape is (H, W, 2) if raw data.

Return type

np.array

get_depthAccuracy()

Get the class of DepthAccuracy.

To get the class of DepthAccuracy. User could read description on depthAccuracy in detail.

Returns

The class DepthAccuracy.

Return type

obj

get_depthFilter_options()

Get the class of DepthFilterOptions.

To get the class of DepthFilterOptions. User could read description on depthFilter in detail.

Returns

The class DepthFilter.

Return type

obj

get_depth_frame(raw_data=False)

Get the depth frame by default callback.

To get the depth frame by default callback. It show rgb frame if raw_data is False, otherwise is raw data. The shape of rgb frame data is (H, W, 3). The shape of raw frame data is (H, W, 2).

Parameters

raw_data (bool) – True is raw data. False is rgb data.

Returns

The array of frame data. The shape is (H, W, 3) if rgb data. The shape is (H, W, 2) if raw data.

Return type

np.array

get_depth_zValue()

Get the z value for depth frame.

To get the z value for depth frame.

Returns

The array of z value of depth frame. The size is (H, W).

Return type

np.array

get_device()

Get the camera device.

To get the camera device for operating the device in detail.

Returns

The class Device.

Return type

obj

pause()

Pause the stream.

To pause the stream.

start(config=None, colorFrameCallback=None, depthFrameCallback=None, PCFrameCallback=None)

Start the stream with configure and callback function.

To start the stream with configure and callback function. It would use the default callback function to get frame data of color and depth if callback function is None.

Parameters

  • config (obj) – The class Config.

  • colorFrameCallback (func) – The callback function to get frame from color stream.

  • depthFrameCallback (func) – The callback function to get frame from depth stream.

  • PCFrameCallback (func) – The callback function to get frame from point cloud stream.

stop()

Stop the stream.

To stop the stream and then release device.

This class is to set the configuration of streaming.

Get the resolution of color frame. The return order is height, width.

Returns

The user-provided config. The key is following:

  • colorFormat: The format of color stream.

  • colorWidth: The width of color stream.

  • colorHeight: The height of color stream.

  • depthWidth: The width of depth stream.

  • depthHeight: The width of depth stream.

  • actualFps: The actual fps.

  • depthFormat: The depth data type.

set_color_stream(streamFormat, nEP0Width, nEP0Height, fps)

Set the format and resolution of color stream.

To set the format, resolution, and fps of color stream. Please refer PIF of camera module or ModeConfig.db.

Parameters

  • streamFormat (int) – The format of color stream. 0: YUY2. 1: MJPG. User could refer COLOR_RAW_DATA_YUY2 and COLOR_RAW_DATA_MJPG in COLOR_RAW_DATA_TYPE.

  • nEP0Width (int) – The width of the color stream.

  • nEP0Height (int) – The height of the color stream.

  • fps (int) – The fps of color stream.

set_depth_dataType(DepthDataType)

Set the data type of depth stream.

To set the data type for depth stream. Please refer DEPTH_RAW_DATA_TYPE. The options are: * DEPTH_RAW_DATA_8_BITS * DEPTH_RAW_DATA_11_BITS * DEPTH_RAW_DATA_14_BITS

  • nEP0Width (int) – The width of the depth stream.

  • nEP0Height (int) – The height of the depth stream.

  • fps (int) – The fps of depth stream.

Set the preset mode config.

This function is to make the mode config setting easier. User could select mode index from modeConfig.db to complete config setting.

Parameters

  • pid (int) – The product id of camera module. Please refer the PIF. It is availabel for integer or heximal.

  • index (int) – The mode index in modeConfig.db.

Bases: object

This class manage the functions related to DepthAccuracy.

The design of this class follow the DepthAccuracyOptions.cpp. User could operate the function to get the accuracy information.

Parameters

Disable depth accuracy function.

To disable the depth accuracy function.

enable()

Enable depth accuracy function.

To enable the depth accuracy function.

Note

Notice that it would not guarantee the performance.

class eys3d.DepthFilterOptions(camera_device)

Bases: object

Filter type apply to the depthfilter.

It includes: subsample, edgePreServingFilter, holeFill, temporalFilter and removeCurve sub function. Please see each sub function comment for detail usage.

Parameters

camera_device (obj) – CameraDevice.

disable()

Disable DepthFilter function.

To disable DepthFilter function.

enable()

Enable DepthFilter function.

To enable DepthFilter function.

get_bytes_per_pixel()

Get the number of bytes per pixel.

To get the number of bytes for one pixel.

Returns

The number of bytes for saving one pixel.

Return type

int

is_enabled()

Check the depthFilter status.

To check the status of depth filtering function.

Returns

True for enable. False otherwise.

Return type

bool

class eys3d.Device(camera_index=0)

Bases: object

The class is the function related to eys3d api function.

The class is to control the eys3d api function. First, it creates the EYS3D system to control the device. Second, user could decide the camera module by index provided by EYS3D system. The device could control following function: * Stream * DepthFilter * Property * Register * Depth information

Parameters

device_index (int) – Index for device would like to initialize.

close_stream()

Close stream

To close stream. The device would close the stream then erase the config and callback.

enable_stream()

Enable stream.

To enable stream. It would enable color, depth and point cloud streaming.

get_IRProperty()
get_cameraProperty()

Get the class of CameraProperty.

To get the class of CameraProperty. User could read description on cameraProperty.py in detail.

get_depthAccuracy()

Get the class of DepthAccuracy.

To get the class of DepthAccuracy. User could read description on depthAccuracy in detail.

get_depthFilter_options()

Get the class of DepthFilterOptions.

To get the class of DepthFilterOptions. User could read description on depthFilter in detail.

get_device_index()

Get the index of user-provided camera device.

To get the index of user-provided camera device.

Returns

The index of camera device.

Return type

int

get_device_info()

Get the device infomation.

To get the device information from camera module as dictionary. It contains FW version, VID , PID and etc…

Returns

The device information. The key is following:

  • firmware_version

  • serial_number

  • bus_info

  • mode_name

  • dev_info

    • PID

    • VID

    • dev_name

    • chip_ID

    • dev_type

Return type

dict

get_exposure_range()
get_rectify_mat_log_data(nRectifyLogIndex=None)
get_register_options()
get_usb_type()
get_z_range()
open_device(config, rectLogIndex=0, colorFrameCallback=None, depthFrameCallback=None, PCFrameCallback=None)

Open camera device with Config and callback function.

It would call APC_OpenDevice by stream setting. In the meantime, it also registers the callback function to get frame data.

Parameters

  • config (obj) – The Config class. It contains the streaming setting.

  • colorFrameCallback (function) – The callback function of color frame. User could define the callback function. If none, the device could not enable color streaming.

  • depthFrameCallback (function) – The callback function of depth frame. User could define the callback function. If none, the device could not enable depth streaming.

  • PCFrameCallback (function) – The callback function of point cloud frame. User could define the callback function. If none, the device could not enable point cloud streaming.

pause_stream()

Pause stream

To pause stream. The device would hold the resouce of config and callback function and then wait for next action.

release()

Release the device.

The EYS3D system would release the device.

set_z_range(near, far)

class eys3d.Pipeline(device_index=0)

Bases: object

This class is to manage the color, depth and point cloud stream with pipeline process.

This class is to manage the color, depth and point cloud stream with pipeline process. The purpose is for easier device operation. User could start pipeline with user-defined callback function.

Notice:

It will call get_color_frame and get_depth_frame if user start with user-defined callback function.

Parameters

device_index (int) – Index for device would like to initialize.

get_IRProperty()
get_accuracy_info()

Get the information of accruracy.

To get the information of accuracy as dictionary.

Returns

The dictionary contains the information of accuracy. The key is following:

  • distance

  • fill_rate

  • z_accuracy

  • temporal_noise

  • spatial_noise

  • angle

  • angle_x

  • angle_y

Return type

dict

get_cameraProperty()

Get the class of CameraProperty.

To get the class of CameraProperty. User could read description on cameraProperty.py in detail.

Returns

The class CameraProperty.

Return type

obj

get_color_frame(raw_data=False)

Get the color frame by default callback.

To get the color frame by default callback. It show rgb frame if raw_data is False, otherwise is raw data. The shape of rgb frame data is (H, W, 3). The shape of raw frame data is (H, W, 2).

Parameters

raw_data (bool) – True is raw data, YUY2 or MJPG. False is rgb data.

Returns

The array of frame data. The shape is (H, W, 3) if rgb data. The shape is (H, W, 2) if raw data.

Return type

np.array

get_depthAccuracy()

Get the class of DepthAccuracy.

To get the class of DepthAccuracy. User could read description on depthAccuracy in detail.

Returns

The class DepthAccuracy.

Return type

obj

To get the class of DepthFilterOptions. User could read description on depthFilter in detail.

Returns

The class DepthFilter.

Return type

obj

get_depth_frame(raw_data=False)

Get the depth frame by default callback.

To get the depth frame by default callback. It show rgb frame if raw_data is False, otherwise is raw data. The shape of rgb frame data is (H, W, 3). The shape of raw frame data is (H, W, 2).

Parameters

raw_data (bool) – True is raw data. False is rgb data.

Returns

The array of frame data. The shape is (H, W, 3) if rgb data. The shape is (H, W, 2) if raw data.

Return type

np.array

get_depth_zValue()

Get the z value for depth frame.

To get the z value for depth frame.

Returns

The array of z value of depth frame. The size is (H, W).

Return type

pause()

Pause the stream.

To pause the stream.

start(config=None, colorFrameCallback=None, depthFrameCallback=None, PCFrameCallback=None)

Start the stream with configure and callback function.

To start the stream with configure and callback function. It would use the default callback function to get frame data of color and depth if callback function is None.

Parameters

  • config (obj) – The class Config.

  • colorFrameCallback (func) – The callback function to get frame from color stream.

  • depthFrameCallback (func) – The callback function to get frame from depth stream.

  • PCFrameCallback (func) – The callback function to get frame from point cloud stream.

stop()

Stop the stream.

To stop the stream and then release device.
